ModMetaData.name: IExposable checker
ModMetaData.author: Xylthixlm
ModMetaData.description:
This is a tool for mod authors that checks loaded mods for any classes that implement IExposable but don't save a field in the corresponding ExposeData method (unless it's marked [Unsaved]), and emits a warning to the developer log if it detects any.
If you are not a mod author, you do not need this mod.
